m_szDocTitle: Tesla Talks Record Sales at Detroit, Little Else
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Talks Record Sales at Detroit, Little Else January 18th, 2014 by Jo Borrás   Last year, Tesla wowed us all with its slick, 90-second battery swap stations that it promised would be ready by the end of 2013.  At this year’s January 2014 Detroit Auto Show, however, we were told the battery swapping plans were on the back-burner .  We didn’t hear much about the upcoming Model X electric SUV , except that it, too, was delayed.  There wasn’t any news on the ( maybe it will, maybe it won’t be called ) Model E compact, either. What’s going on over at the house that Musk built?  Chris DeMorro, f
